journals.name: Journal - Expedition 34
journals.description: A journal from Expedition 34, detailing their journey into darker territories.
journals.lore: Members of Expedition 34 ventured into crow-infested areas, documenting unusual behavior patterns.

journals.name: Journal - Expedition 40
journals.description: Records from Expedition 40's approach to the mysterious Monolith.
journals.lore: Expedition 40 made significant progress toward the Monolith before their mysterious disappearance.

journals.name: Journal - Expedition 58
journals.description: A journal found during story events in Old Lumiere.
journals.lore: Expedition 58's final entries reveal disturbing changes in the city of Lumiere.

journals.name: Journal - Aline
journals.description: Aline's personal journal, revealing her thoughts and motivations.
journals.lore: Aline's journal provides crucial insight into her role as the Paintress.

journals.name: Journal - Julie
journals.location: The Continent, west of Forgotten Battlefield
journals.description: Julie's expedition records from near the Forgotten Battlefield.
journals.lore: Julie documented strange occurrences near the battlefield before vanishing.

journals.name: Journal - Renoir
journals.description: Renoir's personal writings and artistic philosophy.
journals.lore: Reveals Renoir's descent into madness and obsession with the painted world.

journals.name: Journal - Simon
journals.description: Simon's final thoughts before his ultimate challenge.
journals.lore: Simon's journal reveals his preparation for becoming the ultimate test.

journals.name: Journal - Survivor
journals.description: Last journal of a mysterious survivor.
journals.lore: Final account of someone who witnessed Lumiere's transformation.

music_records.name: Alicia
music_records.description: A haunting melody associated with Alicia.

music_records.name: Aline
music_records.description: Aline's personal theme, beautiful yet melancholic.

music_records.name: Children of Lumière
music_records.description: A song celebrating the children of the great city.

music_records.name: Clea
music_records.description: Clea's theme, obtained after tower completion.

music_records.name: Clea! Don't Pull Your Sister's Hair!
music_records.description: A playful, childish tune from family memories.

music_records.name: Endless Light
music_records.description: A transcendent piece from the artistic realm.

music_records.name: Lumière
music_records.description: The city's anthem, must be collected early.
music_records.requirements: Defeat Mime or visit opera house early

music_records.name: Lettre à Maelle
music_records.description: A personal musical letter, obtained through character interaction.
music_records.requirements: View Verso piano scene before Act 2 ends

music_records.name: Lune
music_records.description: Lune's personal theme, unlocked through friendship.

music_records.name: Our Drafts Collide
music_records.description: The climactic piece that plays during the final confrontation.

special_items.name: Old Key
special_items.description: Opens locked areas containing valuable collectibles.

special_items.name: Colour of Lumina
special_items.description: Valuable currency obtained by trading journals to Berrami.

missable_warning: Only 3 collectibles are missable: 1 Journal, 1 Record (Lumière), and 1 Relationship Interaction. Plan accordingly!
